description: details of a a single category, identified by id or key (if a well-known category)

canMultiSelect.description: true if a job opening can have multiple values for this category

leafSelectionOnly.description: true if a job opening may only have leaf selections for this category

key.description: used to identify categories that are well-known, i.e. agreed on by all apps. User-defined categories don't have a key

name.description: the user visible name for this category
